form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition for Alien Based on Prof. or Occupation,, I-14.

full_text: (10) Les has not resided 15. "X" THE APPROPRIATE BOX BELOW AND FURNISH THE INFORMATION REQUIRED FOR THE BOX MARKED. Alien will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in Hong Kong (City in foreign country) (Foreign country) Alien is in the United States and will apply for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident in the office of the Immigration and Naturalization Service at If the application for adjustment of status is denied (City) (State) the alien will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in (City in foreign country) (Foreign country) PART II-INFORMATION CONCERNING PETITIONING EMPLOYER 16. NAME OF PETITIONER (Full name of organization; if petitioner is an individual give full name with last in capital letters) Mrs Helen HALSEY 17. ADDRESS (Number and street) (Town or city) (State) (ZIP code) 1114, Calle Vista Drive, Beverly Hills, California 90210 18. IF THE BENEFICIARY WILL BE EMPLOYED AT A LOCATION OTHER THAN AT THE ABOVE ADDRESS, GIVE ADDRESS OF PLACE WHERE HE WILL WORK. 19. HAVE YOU EVER FILED A VISA PETITION FOR AN ALIEN BASED ON HIS PROFESSION OR OCCUPATION? YES NO. IF "YES," HOW MANY SUCH PETITIONS HAVE YOU FILED? 20. ARE SEPARATE PETITIONS BEING SUBMITTED AT THIS TIME FOR OTHER ALIENS? YES NO. IF "YES," GIVE NAME OF EACH ALIEN. 21. IS THIS PETITION BASED ON AN UNEXP D CERTIFICATION THE Dr. RTr ENT OF LABOD SPECIFIED NUMBER OF ALIENS WHO WILL PERFORM IDENTICAL SERVICES? YES X NO. If "Yes," give file number of petition to which Certification is attached. 22. THE FOLLOWING DOCUMENTS ARE SUBMITTED AS A PART OF THIS PETITION AND ARE MADE A PART THEREOF. U.S. Department of Labor Forms 575 A and B (certified) The aliens application form and original work references Letter written describing petitioners character and financial ability OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF PETITIONER OR AUTHORIZED REPRESENTATIVE 23. This petition was prepared by: ("X" one) the petitioner another person. If petition was prepared by another person, Item 24 below must "also" be completed. The petition may be subscribed and sworn to or affirmed only by the following persons: In third preference cases-iby the beneficiary himself, or by the person filing the petition on the beneficiary's behalf. In sixth preference cases- by the employer who desires and intends to employ the beneficiary. If the employer is an organization the petition must be signed, subscribed and sworn to or affirmed by a high level officer or employee of the organization. I swear (affirm) that I have examined the contents of this petition and the accompanying documents and that the statements in this petition and the accompanying documents are true and correct to the best of my information and belief. Signature X Helen d alsey Title Housewife (Petitioner's full true, and correct name) 2nd, Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 3511 at SAMUEL J. FOSTER [SEAL] My commission expires Finch A.D. 19 67 Sixth St, Los Angeles 5, Calif (Signature day of of officer February administering Inter oath) My Commission Expires Dec. 2, 1967 Notary (Title) 24. SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM, IF OTHER THAN PETITIONER I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the petitioner and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. Sulla (Signature) Boula 3511, W. Sixth St, Los Angeles, Calif. Jan. 24, 1967 (Address) (Date) TO PETITIONER: DO NOT FILL IN THIS BLOCK-FOR USE OF IMMIGRATION OFFICER a. Corrections numbered ( ) to ( were made by me or at my request. (Date) (City) nature of petitioner or authorized member of petitioner's organization) (Title) STATES appears immediately above was interviewed under oath and affirmed all allegations contained herein. Mrs (City) (Signature and Title) (Page 2) Devective Hills en Halse 450 U.S.
